host_ip_help: IP address of the local Autodarts Boardmanager.
host_port_help: Port number of the local Autodarts Boardmanager.
polling_help: Polling interval in seconds to retrieve data from the Autodarts Boardmanager.
triple_flag: Minimum field for the triple trigger
triple_flag2: Maximum field for the triple trigger
triple_flag2_help: Maximum score field for the triple trigger. Darts with a score above this value will not trigger the Triple-Trigger datapoint.
triple_flag_help: Minimum score field for the triple trigger. Darts with a score below this value will not trigger the Triple-Trigger datapoint.
reset_help: Reset the triple, double, bullseye and miss trigger after x seconds (0 = no reset).
light_target_help: ID of the light target to control lights via Autodarts (e.g., 'light.dartring'). Leave empty to disable light control.
power_target_help: ID of the power target to control power via Autodarts (e.g., 'switch.darts_socket'). Leave empty to disable power control.
txt_one:
This adapter connects your local Autodarts Board Manager to ioBroker.

1) Configure the connection under OPTIONS (host, port, polling, triple range).
2) Map light and power targets under MAPPINGS.
3) Use the created states (throws, traffic light, hardware) in your visualizations, scripts and scenes.
light_txt_desc: Get your lighting data points into the adapter objects.
power_txt_desc: Get your power data points into the adapter objects.
